definition: long and narrow strip of water made for boats or for irrigation, to provide a city with a canal
details:
noun
- long and narrow strip of water made for boats or for irrigation
- a bodily passage or tube lined with epithelial cells and conveying a secretion or other substance
= synonyms: channel
- (astronomy) an indistinct surface feature of Mars once thought to be a system of channels
verb
- to provide a city with a canal
= synonyms: canalize, canalise
